Innovative, interactive & invaluable. Insurance solutions for every occasion

We are insurance brokers and consultants located in Mississauga, Ontario. We have been serving our local community and Ontario for over 30 years! Combining experience and premium service, we are the best place for all your personal and commercial insurance needs in the Greater Toronto Area.

Our Story

For over 30 years we have been building relationships in order to understand our clients unique insurance needs. Our dedicated team of licensed brokers and consultants have the knowledge and experience to provide our clients with professional and personalized service. We strive to always earn their trust & satisfaction. Insurance Executives Brokers & Consultants Inc. has partnered with large, innovated and financially strong insurance companies in order to provide our clients with peace of mind and the best value for their insurance costs.
